page.title: 10BOLTON PERCY SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: Much{entertainment}is,as has always been,self organised and rather un- sophisticated.Television provides most home entertainment and villagers expect to travel quite long distances for leisure pursuits (sport,theatre. cinema,restaurants et al). There is a Sunday school & a monthly youth club held in the{Parish Room,} (also used for coffee mornings, jumble sales,church & women's group meetings. The{Cricket Club}has 2 teams at its ground just outside the village and runs whist drives & quizzes in winter. Church Festivals,garden fetes,fairs feasts & concerts at the Gatehouse barbecues at "The Crown",and school activities all bring people together. {Children}are taken to Colton for horse riding,to Wetherby to swim,to York for judo & gymnastics,to Appleton for Cubs,Brownies,Scouts and Guides.
